ayahs.textUthmani: فَإِذَا ٱسْتَوَيْتَ أَنتَ وَمَن مَّعَكَ عَلَى ٱلْفُلْكِ فَقُلِ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى نَجَّىٰنَا مِنَ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَإِذَا [And when] ٱسْتَوَيْتَ [you (have) boarded] أَنتَ [you] وَمَن [and whoever] مَّعَكَ [(is) with you] عَلَى [[on]] ٱلْفُلْكِ [the ship] فَقُلِ [then say] ٱلْحَمْدُ [Praise] لِلَّهِ [(be) to Allah] ٱلَّذِى [Who] نَجَّىٰنَا [(has) saved us] مِنَ [from] ٱلْقَوْمِ [the people ] ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ [the wrongdoers]
ayahs.transliteration: Fa-itha istawayta anta waman maAAakaAAala alfulki faquli alhamdu lillahi allatheenajjana mina alqawmi aththalimeen

ayahs.textUthmani: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَنزِلْنِى مُنزَلًا مُّبَارَكًا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلْمُنزِلِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَقُل [And say] رَّبِّ [My Lord] أَنزِلْنِى [cause me to land] مُنزَلًۭا [(at) a landing place] مُّبَارَكًۭا [blessed] وَأَنتَ [and You] خَيْرُ [(are) the Best] ٱلْمُنزِلِينَ [(of) those who cause to land.']
ayahs.transliteration: Waqul rabbi anzilnee munzalan mubarakanwaanta khayru almunzileen

ayahs.textUthmani: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ وَإِن كُنَّا لَمُبْتَلِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] فِى [in] ذَٰلِكَ [that] لَـَٔايَـٰتٍۢ [surely (are) Signs] وَإِن [and indeed] كُنَّا [We are] لَمُبْتَلِينَ [surely testing]
ayahs.transliteration: Inna fee thalika laayatinwa-in kunna lamubtaleen

ayahs.textUthmani: ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَا مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ قَرْنًا ءَاخَرِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: ثُمَّ [Then] أَنشَأْنَا [We produced] مِنۢ [after them] بَعْدِهِمْ [after them] قَرْنًا [a generation] ءَاخَرِينَ [another]
ayahs.transliteration: Thumma ansha/na min baAAdihim qarnan akhareen

ayahs.textUthmani: فَأَرْسَلْنَا فِيهِمْ رَسُولًا مِّنْهُمْ أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥٓ ۖ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَأَرْسَلْنَا [And We sent] فِيهِمْ [among them] رَسُولًۭا [a Messenger] مِّنْهُمْ [from themselves] أَنِ [[that]] ٱعْبُدُوا۟ [Worship] ٱللَّهَ [Allah] مَا [not] لَكُم [for you] مِّنْ [(is) any] إِلَـٰهٍ [god] غَيْرُهُۥٓ ۖ [other than Him] أَفَلَا [Then will not] تَتَّقُونَ [you fear]
ayahs.transliteration: Faarsalna feehim rasoolan minhum anioAAbudoo Allaha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhuafala tattaqoon

ayahs.textUthmani: وَقَالَ ٱلْمَلَأُ مِن قَوْمِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِلِقَآءِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ وَأَتْرَفْنَـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا مَا هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُكُمْ يَأْكُلُ مِمَّا تَأْكُلُونَ مِنْهُ وَيَشْرَبُ مِمَّا تَشْرَبُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَقَالَ [And said] ٱلْمَلَأُ [the chiefs] مِن [of] قَوْمِهِ [his people] ٱلَّذِينَ [who] كَفَرُوا۟ [disbelieved] وَكَذَّبُوا۟ [and denied] بِلِقَآءِ [(the) meeting] ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ [(of) the Hereafter] وَأَتْرَفْنَـٰهُمْ [while We had given them luxury] فِى [in] ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ [the life] ٱلدُّنْيَا [(of) the world] مَا [Not] هَـٰذَآ [(is) this] إِلَّا [but] بَشَرٌۭ [a man] مِّثْلُكُمْ [like you] يَأْكُلُ [He eats] مِمَّا [of what] تَأْكُلُونَ [you eat] مِنْهُ [[from it]] وَيَشْرَبُ [and he drinks] مِمَّا [of what] تَشْرَبُونَ [you drink]
ayahs.transliteration: Waqala almalao min qawmihi allatheenakafaroo wakaththaboo biliqa-i al-akhiratiwaatrafnahum fee alhayati addunyama hatha illa basharun mithlukum ya/kulumimma ta/kuloona minhu wayashrabu mimma tashraboon

words.translation: while We had given them luxury

ayahs.textUthmani: وَلَئِنْ أَطَعْتُم بَشَرًا مِّثْلَكُمْ إِنَّكُمْ إِذًا لَّخَـٰسِرُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَلَئِنْ [And surely if] أَطَعْتُم [you obey] بَشَرًۭا [a man] مِّثْلَكُمْ [like you] إِنَّكُمْ [indeed, you] إِذًۭا [then] لَّخَـٰسِرُونَ [surely (will be) losers]
ayahs.transliteration: Wala-in ataAAtum basharan mithlakuminnakum ithan lakhasiroon

ayahs.textUthmani: أَيَعِدُكُمْ أَنَّكُمْ إِذَا مِتُّمْ وَكُنتُمْ تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَنَّكُم مُّخْرَجُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: أَيَعِدُكُمْ [Does he promise you ] أَنَّكُمْ [that you] إِذَا [when] مِتُّمْ [you are dead] وَكُنتُمْ [and you become] تُرَابًۭا [dust] وَعِظَـٰمًا [and bones] أَنَّكُم [that you] مُّخْرَجُونَ [(will be) brought forth]
ayahs.transliteration: AyaAAidukum annakum itha mittumwakuntum turaban waAAithaman annakummukhrajoon

ayahs.wordByWord: ۞ هَيْهَاتَ [Far-(fetched)] هَيْهَاتَ [far-(fetched)] لِمَا [is what] تُوعَدُونَ [you are promised]

ayahs.textUthmani: إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنْيَا نَمُوتُ وَنَحْيَا وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَبْعُوثِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: إِنْ [Not] هِىَ [it] إِلَّا [(is) but] حَيَاتُنَا [our life] ٱلدُّنْيَا [(of) the world] نَمُوتُ [we die] وَنَحْيَا [and we live] وَمَا [and not] نَحْنُ [we] بِمَبْعُوثِينَ [(will be) resurrected]
ayahs.transliteration: In hiya illa hayatunaaddunya namootu wanahya wamanahnu bimabAAootheen

ayahs.textUthmani: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلٌ ٱفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا وَمَا نَحْنُ لَهُۥ بِمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: إِنْ [Not] هُوَ [(is) he] إِلَّا [but] رَجُلٌ [a man] ٱفْتَرَىٰ [who (has) invented] عَلَى [about] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] كَذِبًۭا [a lie] وَمَا [and not] نَحْنُ [we] لَهُۥ [(in) him] بِمُؤْمِنِينَ [(are) believers]
ayahs.transliteration: In huwa illa rajulun iftaraAAala Allahi kathiban wama nahnulahu bimu/mineen

ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] رَبِّ [My Lord] ٱنصُرْنِى [Help me] بِمَا [because] كَذَّبُونِ [they deny me]
قَالَ [He said] عَمَّا [After a little while] قَلِيلٍۢ [After a little while] لَّيُصْبِحُنَّ [surely they will become] نَـٰدِمِينَ [regretful]

ayahs.textUthmani: فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّيْحَةُ بِٱلْحَقِّ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ غُثَآءً ۚ فَبُعْدًا لِّلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ [So seized them] ٱلصَّيْحَةُ [the awful cry] بِٱلْحَقِّ [in truth] فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ [and We made them] غُثَآءًۭ ۚ [(as) rubbish of dead leaves] فَبُعْدًۭا [So away] لِّلْقَوْمِ [with the people ] ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ [the wrongdoers]
ayahs.transliteration: Faakhathat-humu assayhatubilhaqqi fajaAAalnahum ghuthaanfabuAAdan lilqawmi aththalimeen

ayahs.textUthmani: ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَا مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ قُرُونًا ءَاخَرِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: ثُمَّ [Then] أَنشَأْنَا [We produced] مِنۢ [after them] بَعْدِهِمْ [after them] قُرُونًا [a generation] ءَاخَرِينَ [another]
